overview: In charge of the iTouch-Buongiorno integration plan, Matteo Montan leads and coordinates the global integration of iTouch and Buongiorno. After being responsible for several years for the design, development and rollout of the Group Product Offering, now drives a comprehensive plan focussing on optimising resources, competences, portfolio of products and services; rationalising technology assets and delivery capabilities and driving overall efficiencies and flawless implementation of the integrated Organisational model. A journalist, with a degree in Law, before joining B! in 2000 as editor-in-Chief, Mr. Montan has worked for leading Italian newspapers and magazines, being awarded in 1999 “Reporter of the Year”.
